mapping¶

Identity v3

Requires: OS-FEDERATION extension

mapping create¶

Create new mapping

os mapping create
    --rules <filename>
    <name>
--rules <filename>¶

Filename that contains a set of mapping rules (required)

<name>

New mapping name (must be unique)

mapping delete¶

Delete mapping

os mapping delete
    <mapping>
<mapping>

Mapping to delete

mapping list¶

List mappings

os mapping list

mapping set¶

Set mapping properties

os mapping set
    [--rules <filename>]
    <mapping>
--rules <filename>¶

Filename that contains a new set of mapping rules

<mapping>

Mapping to modify

mapping show¶

Display mapping details

os mapping show
    <mapping>
<mapping>

Mapping to display
